SELECT id rid,gmt_create,gmt_modified,user_id,order_no,third_order_no,third_detail_url, status,user_coupon_id,order_type,sec_type,goods_id,open_id,num_id,goods_name,goods_icon,count, price_amount,sale_amount,actual_amount,shop_name,pay_status,pay_type,pay_trade_no,gmt_pay,trade_no, gmt_rebated,mobile,gmt_finished,rebate_amount,commission_amount,bank_id,gmt_pay_end,service_provider,nper,risk_order_no,status_remark,goods_price_name FROM af_order WHERE is_delete=0 and user_id = #{userId}
and (status = 'NEW' or status = 'PAID')
and status = 'FINISHED'
and status = 'REBATED'
and status in('NEW','PAYFAIL')
and status = 'DEALING'
and status = 'PAID' and order_type='AGENTBUY'
and status = 'REVIEW' and order_type='AGENTBUY'
and (( status = 'PAID' and order_type!='AGENTBUY' ) or status = 'AGENCYCOMPLETED')
and status = 'DELIVERED'
and status = 'FINISHED' and rebate_amount > 0
and ((status = 'FINISHED' and rebate_amount = 0) or status = 'REBATED')
and status = 'CLOSED'
and status = 'WAIT_REFUND'
and status = 'DEAL_REFUNDING'
order by gmt_create desc

SELECT
FROM af_order WHERE is_delete=0 AND id = #{orderId}

select pay_trade_no from af_order WHERE #{endDate} >= gmt_pay AND gmt_pay >=#{startDate} and gmt_pay is not null and order_type IN('BOLUOME','AGENTBUY') and status in ('PAID','REVIEW','AGENCYCOMPLETED','DELIVERED','FINISHED','REBATED','WAITING_REFUND','DEAL_REFUNDING') and pay_trade_no !='' ORDER BY gmt_pay DESC LIMIT 1;

select a.id rid,a.user_id,a.order_no, a.goods_name, a.price_amount,a.sale_amount,a.actual_amount, a.shop_name,a.nper from af_order a left join af_borrow b on a.id = b.`order_id` where a.order_type = 'BOLUOME' and a.status in ('PAID','FINISHED','REBATED','WAITING_REFUND','DEAL_REFUNDING') and a.pay_type = 'AP' and b.id is null
mapper.update: UPDATE af_order SET gmt_modified=NOW(),is_delete = 1 WHERE id=#{rid}
